messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

please action submit your time cards for approval please action submit your cards for approval hi receiving ever since error few weeks ago you then stated we have anything any advice below please should submit them thanks sent monday please action submit your cards for approval dear you receiving because you have cards haven submitted for approval please note enough only enter your but also make you submit your for approval take corrective actions case your submitted card gets rejected below breakdown your submitted cards please submit for approval your accordingly possible country submitted cards card status saved saved total submitted cards submitted cards statuses explained error usually happens when you log calendar view for period longer than days then delete one entry causes timecard switch error fix you should add back for deleted or delete entire timecard using right hand side menu recreate again rejected card was rejected by one approvers please correct card entries accordingly resubmit entered status timecard when only one or few days entire timecard have entered saved cards status passed entered validation but gone next submission step for any card issues you can resolve please wait but raise corresponding incident through portal for resolutions

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing HR issues**

I’m dealing with a timecard switch error that requires resubmission through the portal. This system is primarily used by HR/payroll, so it goes into the HR Support category, despite it being more of an IT issue. I’ll choose "HR Support" or maybe "Miscellaneous," but HR Support seems more fitting since it relates to timecard approvals. I need to format my response correctly as a JSON object with the category. Alright, I’m ready to go!{"category":"HR Support"}
